name: Hipwerk
description:
Hipwerk is a tech laboratory focused on developing peculiar web solutions.
Taking pride in every product we ship, we pick each one of them carefully and avoid tradeoffs which compromise quality.
Seeing the good & the bad of the corporate outsourcing world, we took our lessons & decided to follow our own way. Combining the best practices we learned along the years together with the innovation and motivation of a startup, we try to provide the best of both worlds.
